item.description:
First meeting is:

Monday, march 16th, 7 pm in the Watson room at the forbes library
in Northampton ( 20 west street, northampton, ma, 01060 )

Optional first book is Giovanni's Room by James Baldwin

But don't worry you **don't have to read it** to come to the first meeting â€“ it's just a first meeting/planning meeting, with optional time for sticking around and chatting about the book after.

*Note* group might not meet on mondays in future. Also might be nice to meet members' homes, if there seems to be a core group of committed people, and folks are willing to host [ = more food & drink ]
item.how_to_find_us: ask at circulation desk. the watson room is upstairs.
item.name: organizational (first) meeting
